entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • A dotnet.generated.invalid node shows up in the browser dev tools when running a .NET 8 Preview 3 Blazor WebAssembly app #84950
  • Linux musl x64 build break apparently due to some libc version mismatch (high priority as it is blocking clean CI) #84949
  • [API Proposal]: Add GetElapsedTime(long) #84945
    8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Environment.GetCommandLineArgs() throws nullref exception #84944
  • XUnit log fixer creates invalid XML when fixing the xml after a timed out test #84940
  • Make dependency on lld optional during runtime build #84934
  • Remove Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyModel 6.0.0 pre-build dependency #84925
    8.0.0
  • TE startup/time-to-first-request regression #84923
  • 3.6 MB size regression updating System.Text.Json to 8.0.0 #84922
  • ContainsGenericParameters not reported for function pointer types #84916
  • Test failure Interop\\NativeLibrary\\API\\NativeLibraryTests\\NativeLibraryTests.cmd #84914
  • Test failure Loader\\binding\\tracing\\BinderTracingTest.ResolutionFlow\\BinderTracingTest.ResolutionFlow #84913
    8.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\opt\\Vectorization\\UnrollEqualsStartsWIth\\UnrollEqualsStartsWIth.cmd #84912
    8.0.0
  • Test failure baseservices\\exceptions\\stackoverflow\\stackoverflowtester\\stackoverflowtester.cmd #84911
  • AV in ComWrappers.ComInterfaceDispatch.GetInstance<T> on NativeAOT during second lookup #84908
    8.0.0

Closed

  • Degraded performance in metering when creating a lot of instruments #84713
    8.0.0
  • Plugin method is ignored without exception if method signature changed #84836
  • Test failure Regressions\\coreclr\\0046\\istype\\istype.cmd #79263
  • Test failure Regressions\\coreclr\\0044\\nullable\\nullable.cmd #78083
    8.0.0
  • Test failure Regressions\\coreclr\\22728\\debug15\\debug15.cmd #77251
  • Test failure TypeGeneratorTests1200-1299 #81112
  • Test failure GC\\LargeMemory\\API\\gc\\suppressfinalize\\suppressfinalize.cmd #77820
    8.0.0
  • Test failure Regressions\\coreclr\\GitHub_22348\\Test22348\\Test22348.cmd #81120
  • Test failure JIT/Methodical/xxobj/sizeof/sizeof64_Target_64Bit_and_arm_il_r/sizeof64_Target_64Bit_and_arm.cmd #81109
    8.0.0
  • How to implement an Ipv4 and Ipv6 Socket connection? #84893
  • Build test machine images step fails in CI #35507
    Future
  • System.Text.Json fails to build on .NET Native due to unconstrained raw pointer uses #84895

PullRequests

Created

  • Disable TLS field access for Arm #84954
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix Environment.GetCommandLineArg for AOT compiled libraries #84953
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix R2R test build #84952
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Delete `GT_STORE_OBJ` #84951
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix unrollings on AVX1-only machines #84946
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Lowering Vector512() methods : comparison + shift #84942
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • Acclerate `Vector512` multiply and divide. #84941
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • Avx512: Abs, ceil, floor, min, max #84937
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Backport #78136 to .NET 7 #84936
    Servicing-consider, tenet-performance, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, source-generator, 7.0.x
  • Don't contain operands for intrinsics when generating a jmp table fallback #84933
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Accelerate Vector512 `ConvertToSingle` and `ConvertToInt32`. #84932
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • Flow TasksConfiguration in build & specify generator config #84931
    area-Infrastructure
  • [iOS][maccatalyst] Reenable MacCatalyst and Simulator CI runs #84930
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono][jit] Adding Vector128.GetElement as intrinsic in arm64. #84929
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Fix for incorrect release of CCW holder #84927
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use cinv instead of csel when possible #84926
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Restructure WellKnownOids.cs #84921
    area-System.Formats.Asn1, size-reduction
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` checking for prefix/suffix #84920
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Fix instuctions for nativeaot build #84919
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Enable CS1591 for projects that don't use intellisense package XML file #84917
    needs-area-label
  • Expose AVX512 variants of SSE-SSE4.2 instructions #84909
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, arch-avx512

Merged

  • Reconfigure the HWIntrinsic tests to run more selectively #84948
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • fix aarch64+clang compilation errors #84947
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Add issues.targets entries for four tests failing on Windows arm #84943
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Re-enable gc-sections with lld for NativeAOT #84935
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Move mono.mscordbi subset off the offical build #84939
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Deduplicate Binary Integer parsing logic #84582
    area-System.Numerics
  • [release/7.0] Move mono.mscordbi subset off the offical build #84938
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Memory Diagnostics: GC Bookkeeping #84454
    enhancement, area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix JIT use of BitScan* APIs #84915
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix nativeaot libraries test cross-build #84870
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [browser] Integrate compression from StaticWebAssets #84924
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Enable AVX-512 for string/span Equals/StartsWith #84885
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • [JIT] ARM64 - Combine `cmp` and shift ops into a single `cmp` op #84605
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add status code and exception info to System.Net.Http events #84036
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Bump emscripten to 3.1.34 #83998
    area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] PackedSimd, add extending integer arithmetic #84687
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Implement IUtf8SpanFormattable on Complex #84779
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono][jit] Adding Vector128.Dot as intrinsic for arm64. #84245
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Adding Vector128.Narrow,Widen as intrinsics on arm64. #84837
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.0
  • Improve SequenceEqual for constant lengths unrolling #84524
    area-System.Memory
  • Fix JitDisasmWithAlignmentBoundaries #84827
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [main] Upload buildlogs with an _Attempt suffix #83826
  • [RISC-V] Fix build error #84910
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Baseline two systemic failures in the CoreCLR outerloop pipeline #84904
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Generate SslConnectionInfo.Unix.cs with T4 template #84690
    area-System.Net.Security, size-reduction, community-contribution
  • Revert use of raw pointers in System.Text.Json (#78741)" #84899
    area-System.Text.Json

Updated

  • Specify -z notext on linux-musl-x86 #83682
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Create a createdump static library for single-file dump generation #84864
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Don't re-instrument methods which don't need that #84772
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [JIT] ARM64 - Combine 'neg' and 'cmp' to 'cmn' #84667
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use Roslyn Source Generator Testing SDK to test interop source generators #84867
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, test-enhancement, source-generator
  • Add a dedicated Ascii.IsValid path #84881
    area-System.Buffers, 8.0.0
  • [JIT] ARM32/ARM64 - Fixed zero/sign-extension for `GT_STORE_LCL_VAR` in codegen #84716
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Extend PreInitialization Support to readonly GC fields #84431
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #84610
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Expose setting CPU SamplingProfiler rate #83635
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #84611
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • AssemblyBuilder.Save add custom attributes handling. #84580
    area-System.Reflection, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Updating XML doc comments for hardware intrinsics to include VEX and EVEX forms #84892
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, arch-avx512
  • Adjust managed type system for new function pointer handling #84819
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Skip DllImportSearchPathsTest on wasm #84735
    area-Interop-mono
  • restore the upper vector at the use of GT_FIELD_LIST #84824
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Attempt to fix #84636 #84871
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Upgrade arm64 cross image to Ubuntu 22.04 / llvm-15 #83939
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Fix running tests against our DNNE'd NativeExports project to work in NativeAOT #84578
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • [wasm] Add Vector128 and PackedSimd support to the jiterpreter; add PackedSimd to the interpreter #82773
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Fix async XsdValidatingReader to not use synchronious IO #84888
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Address a couple `TODO-ADDR`s #84906
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser] Minimal blazor.boot.json integration #84296
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Fix processing of x86 test results #82301
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Exclude things which broken on Loongarch #78850
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • NoGCRegion Callback #82045
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Annotate Microsoft.CSharp library code for DynamicCode #82747
    area-Microsoft.CSharp, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/7.0-staging] Tar: Add missing TarFile.CreateFromDirectoryAsync roundtrip tests #84856
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Formats.Tar, 7.0.x
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • [mono][tasks] Extract EmitWasmBundle into generic EmitBundle task and enable bundling in mono self-contained library #84191
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Publish Aggregated Values For `Counter` and `UpDownCounter` For System.Diagnostics.Metrics #84846
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution
  • Disallow `BLK<SIMD>` #84868
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add binary support to number formatting #84889
    area-System.Runtime
  • Use net6.0 SqlClient TFM under source-build #84782
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add PipeOptions.FirstPipeInstance enum value #83936
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Support nocheck prefix #81615
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • WIP: Optimize `ComputeLastIndex` #83441
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Ascii.Equals and Ascii.EqualsIgnoreCase #84886
    area-System.Text.Encoding, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` SortKey #84621
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • [RISC-V][GC] Use 128gb for regions_range on RISCV64 #84797
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [Draft] Limit length of System.Runtime.BigInteger to int.MaxValue-32 bits #84901
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0-staging] define UNW_AARCH64 aliases conditionally #84873
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-staging] define UNW_AARCH64 aliases conditionally #84874
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • [HTTP/3] Stress hack for msquic dropping connections #84793
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Enable event pipe test in NativeAOT CI run #84891
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` indexing #84471
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Enable mono runtime to handle SIGTERM like CoreCLR #82806 #82813
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Almost complete sync of logic for generating DAM/RUC reflection access warnings between ILLink and NativeAOT #84770
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Disable corelib crossgen2 #84781
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Fix HTTP3 header decoder buffer allocation #78862
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Fix OperatingSystemTest.TestIsOSPlatform_MacCatalyst #84842
    needs-area-label
  • Start running Loader and Interop tests for NativeAOT #84404
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • [RISC-V][JIT] JIT/CodeGenBringUpTest #84748
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • A bug between <RuntimeFrameworkVersion> and runtimeconfig.json includedFrameworks version #31836
  • Wrong "workload not found" message #31835
  • Self-contained app with Trim unused code selected trims used code #31832

PullRequests

Created

  • Update dependabot to run on 4xx #31837
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Disable dotnet.js fingerprinting for .NET 8 #31829
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 19.12.1 to 19.12.3 in /eng/dependabot #31828
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: 7.0.3xx

Merged

  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 19.12.1 to 19.12.3 in /eng/dependabot #31827
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: main
  • Update CSS parser version #31809
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #31808
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add optional logging to MSBuild SDK Resolver #26904

Updated

  • Updating the minimum VS version #31720
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • dotnet sln: Add error message for misplaced solution argument #18608
    Area-CLI
  • Prevent restore loop in VS #31798
    Area-External, untriaged
  • Wasm SDK packed as a nuget package #31519
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Allow `dotnet sln list` to display solution folder paths #18502
    Area-CLI
  • Register off-by-default analyzer: configuration binding generator #31654
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, .NET 8.0
  • Add IsAotCompatible flag to enable all analyzers and IsTrimmable #31766
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Add `-aot` parameter to the console template #31739
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Champion "Discriminated Unions" #113

  • [Proposal]: Allow nameof to always access instance members from static context #4037

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EnC Razor scenario: allow adding new lambda closures #67841
  • Nullable warnings not appearing in IDE #67839

Closed

  • Formatter doesn't work correctly with nested list patterns #67516
  • ExtractInterfaceCodeRefactoringProvider encountered an error and has been disabled #39328
    Backlog
  • Refactoring (Extract Interface) - Allow inclusion of Doc Comments #64793
    Backlog
  • Imposibility of Edit and continue with method with attribute with type in constructor #67703
  • Assert compiling dotnet/runtime in NullableWalker #67040
    17.7
  • Emit cgt, likewise clt, for comparisons #61483
    C# 12.0
  • is and is not resolve differently #67834

PullRequests

Created

  • Backport #67430 further #67851
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add `IsExplicitExtension` #67850
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Val/revert66430 17.6 #67849
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Backport #67430 to add new package feeds to servicing branches #67848
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge ITextAndVersion and ITextVersionable #67847
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Revert "Use dictionary lookup while resolving assembly references (#66430)" #67846
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add A/B option to test if disabling 'recoverable text' helps/hurts us #67845
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Additional places where locations can be avoided #67844
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add A/B option to test if a pushing data immediately to secondary storage is desirable. #67843
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Only used cached remote-host-provider for preview workspace if it shares the same set of host-services. #67840
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove ValueTuple workaround #67837
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Include diagnostic help URL in output #67836
    Area-Compilers, 17.7
  • Clarify documentation of `TrackedOutputSteps` #67835
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.7

Merged

  • Fix formatting of nested list patterns #67832
    Community
  • Add support for parameter-less LSP requests #67829
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Revert "Use dictionary lookup while resolving assembly references (#6… #67808
    Area-Compilers, Regression, untriaged
  • Qualify values in the RHS of object initializers #67842
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Move to non-segmented dictionary #67825
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Interactive Window: Flow both culture and UI culture #67771
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Cache the names of assembly symbols for PEReferences #67828
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Avoid realizing locations array when finding the symbol found in a particular location. #67691
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Pool 'boxed' helper objects used during constraints checking #67724
    Area-Compilers, 17.7
  • Reduce allocations of StateForCase instances. #67778
    Area-Compilers, 17.7
  • Have AsyncLazy always cache values #67207
    Area-IDE
  • Null coalescing assignment for nullable value type should set state of nullable type not underlying type #67468
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Generate branchless IL for `(b ? 1 : 0)` #67191
    Area-Compilers

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.6-vs-deps to main #67852
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Interceptors more #67786
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Ignore file-local source declarations when searching for well-known types #67183
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Do not allocate Location[]s for source methods #67823
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Collection literals natural type #67364
  • Use proper type for `BoundAwaitOperator` in VB statement #67822
    Language-VB, Area-Compilers, Feature - IOperation, 17.7
  • Only pack the shipping/non-shipping nupkgs for roslyn #67679
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • New contracts #67811
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • WIP: Not for review - Merged branch of all perf work. #67730
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Pool intermediary dictionaries use to create named type and namespace members #67727
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Adjust IsAttributeTargetSpecifier helper #67833
  • Annotate MS.CA and MS.CA.C# for trimming #66519
    Area-Compilers
  • Update `nameof` feature status #67794
    Area-Compilers, Documentation
  • Pool node collections in analyzer driver. #67776
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Improve detection of receiver cloning in ref safety analysis #67736
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Implement element access for inline array types #67830
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Fix unimported completions show in places where they should not be #67283
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Semantic snippets: Add inline statement snippets #67819
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Add FilterSpan API to analyzer contexts #67818
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf improvement: mapaction #47750
  • Documentation problem and/or API problem #47749
  • Blazor: Apply Theme from Local Storage or User Storage will Meet Flicker #47746
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.RateLimiting metrics #47745
  • Undocumented breaking change in ASP.NET Core 7 model binding when using Nullability #47744
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Make RequestImageFileAsync customizable (or allow us to change BrowserFile data) #47743
    Backlog
  • Perf improvement: mvc #47742

Closed

  • Add support for binding to MarkupString values #47718
  • Perf improvement: single_query #47738
  • Allow an attribute on OnInitializedAsync to specify that the required members are set or never referenced. #47736
  • Any update on when the Authorization Server enhancements will ship? #47699
  • > I have seen no indications of this being addressed: There should be an automatic, native and super efficient way of making function calls between the client and the server. #47703
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #47733
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef, mvc #47735
  • Perf regression: connectionclose #47739
  • WEB API 6.0 - Return 500 instead of 401 when post large data with anonymous #47483

PullRequests

Created

  • Blazor form model expression formatting #47754
    area-blazor
  • Replace ISystemClock with TimeProvider in OutputCaching, ResponseCaching #47753
    area-signalr
  • [blazor] Boot handled by dotnet.js #47752
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm
  • Replace lock with CAS #47751
    area-runtime
  • [SignalR] Seamless Reconnect #47748
    area-signalr
  • RDG metadata generation based on endpoint response type. #47741
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Workaround for ASP.NET composite image per #84860 #47747
    area-infrastructure

Updated

  • [Blazor] Adds support for server side rendered forms (without a body) #47716
    area-blazor
  • Add support for logging/throwing exceptions in RDG #47657
    area-runtime, feature-rdg
  • Obsolete and replace ISystemClock in Security, Identity #47472 #47717
    breaking-change, area-security, blog-candidate, needs-breaking-change-announcement
  • Enable AOT template tests #47247
    area-mvc, area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview4
  • Log if request reaches the end of request pipeline #47681
    area-runtime
  • Update ReadMe.SharedCode.md to mention runtime-sync.yml #47722
    needs-area-label
  • Change incorrect usage of ArgumentNullException #47731
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Make HttpLogging middleware endpoint aware #47595
    area-runtime, feature-middleware

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-17
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • should_check_bgc_mark and fgc_should_consider_object need to be updated for regions #2208
    8.0.0
  • Failed to profile .NET iOS app (`dotnet trace`: Unable to read beyond the end of the stream) #3828

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • xamarin_process_managed_exception caused by MainPage initialization #14626
  • ScrollView content with Buttons rendered offscreen do not respond on iOS #14624
  • Image Loaded Event isn't called under certain conditions on IOS #14622
  • iOS app is crashing while tap any key on keyboard #14621
  • [Android] Unable to tap clear button in Entry when inside a Grid #14620
  • [Non-Shell] Toolbar items are affected from previous page on Android #14617
    Backlog
  • FlyoutMenuPage is tap-throughable (on Android) #14609
  • Unable to show images in a collection view due to layout issues #14606

Closed

  • [regression/7.0.81] Grid can't use star and auto together in version 7.0.81 #14520
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Partial classes and methods not working for .net maui library #14601
  • Entry Layout broken after Update .NET MAUI to 7.0.81 #14562
  • "Pair to Mac" in Visual Studio 2022 not working when Mac is behind proxy with authentication #14534
  • Enable using Safari dev tools with BlazorWebView #14590
    8.0-preview4
  • Pipeline commands fail with a dependency on maui-tizen #11579
    .NET 8 Planning
  • [Windows] Can't include MAUI and WinForms in the same project #6450
    Backlog
  • Still cannot build in Release mode on Android with AOT and trimming disabled #14605
  • x:Array as resource with key crashes app on device launch #9422
    .NET 8 Planning
  • [Android]: CollectionView header template is not rendered #14603
  • [Android] RuntimeException: Canvas: trying to draw too large bitmap #14604
  • Opening Maui Blazor Hybrid Project Properties Crashes #14602
  • Photo orientation #14607
  • Moving MAUI Window between monitors with different scalling has issues #14597
  • On iOS Property InputTransparent=true does not work for LABEL #14124
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [graphics] fix CA1307 and CA1309 for performance #14627
  • [controls] fix performance issue in {AppThemeBinding} #14625
    area/collectionview 📃, area/controls 🎮
  • Set menuItem show action back to Never #14623
    backport/suggested
  • [iOS] Clear BindingContext when cell is queued for reuse #14619
  • [Android] Fix IsEnabled property on Android SearchBar #14616
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [Android] Fix issue in Entry Drawable using API Level 23 #14615
    platform/android 🤖, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Optimize iOS selection synchronization #14613

Merged

  • Bump Microsoft.Web.WebView2 from 1.0.1722.32 to 1.0.1722.45 #14584
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Add updated WKWebView Inspectable flag #14610
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • [xaml] fix x:Array and x:Double in Release mode #14546
    area/Xaml </>, backport/suggested
  • [net7.0] Try fix ems on net7 #14614
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • [net7.0] [Android] Properly remove the Frame's border thickness #14565
    area/controls 🎮, control-frame
  • [Windows] Fix crash swapping MainPage #14262
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/navigation 🧭
  • Support both Update and Include for maui #14576
    area/setup 🪄
  • Add Xceed partners #14571
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix Layout issues with the details page on Flyout #12909
    area/layout 🔲, partner/cat 😻, backport/suggested
  • Make Benchmarks.Droid runnable as APK for perf testing #14447
    area/perf 🏎️, community ✨
  • Added ICommandMapper for extension methods #14545
  • Update mappers instead of replacing field values #13836
    t/breaking 💥, do-not-merge, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [Android] Fix gestures in Label Spans #14410
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-label, area/gestures
  • Allow SearchBar to take full width on Android #13716
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Style specificity #13818
    area/Xaml </>
  • Centralize logic for handling logical children #14132

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • The default behavior of translate boolean on SQLite #30709
  • DateOnly to DateTime bcl conversion not translated to sql cast method #30708
  • Cannot serialize Dictionary<string, string> in a JSON column #30707
  • Stop combining delete and insert pairs into updates #30705
  • Allow 'unsharing' connection between contexts #30704
  • Which .NET core versions are required this package? #30703

Closed

  • Add/Rename/Delete/Data Type Changes of Column Should Auto Be Modified In Database Table By EF Core #30690
  • user-defined-function-mapping go to Learn instead of Github #30681
    8.0.0
  • How to change the type of a single entity in a one-to-many collection? #30611
  • why the collection type is List instead of HashSet #30687
  • ExecuteUpdate returns error when updating entity contains owned type #30696

PullRequests

Created

  • Allow changing an open connection if it's not owned #30706

Merged

  • Tiny cleanup of CloningExpressionVisitor #30700
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #30664
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • vs_buildtools.exe. The application cannot find one of its required files, possibly because it was unable to create it in the folder. Please make sure that the folder in which this application was downloaded is accessible and not read-only. #16131

PullRequests

Created

  • SDK build under source-build should use MicrosoftNetCompilersToolsetVersion property #16138
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1224: Build ID 2160599 #16135
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #16134

Merged

  • Update SB prebuilts tarball #16137
  • Add lci files to filter localization #15515
  • Patch to fix command-line-api to work with latest SDK #16136
  • Include the swr file in the nuget package #16127

Updated

  • Enable PVP flow for arcade #16111
    Area-SourceBuild
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #16126
